name: The Planting Dead
description:
CONTROLS:

Move: WASD / Arrow keys
Jump: C / J / Spacebar
Get in and out of robot: X / K
Pick up and place down plant: C / J / Space
Throw plant: Z / L

Restart level: R

The Planting Dead is a simple platformer with puzzle elements.

You are a little ghost whose world once full with life has gone to ruin. Help our little guy plant weird carrots into the ground by possessing old robots. To save the world! ...Or something.

How to play:

Your objective is to get the weird carrot looking thing:

Into the goal:

You can't pick the vegetables up with your ghost, so you have to possess conveniently shaped robots to progress.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1
